name: pennyroyal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of mint (= a herb) that produces small purple flowers and an oil with a strong smell: Pennyroyal needs to be planted in a moist soil. There was a bunch of lavender, pennyroyal, and rue hanging above the door of the kitchen.
More examplesFewer examplesYou may be able to deter ants and rodents by planting pennyroyal and peppermint.Attaching a few dried pennyroyal leaves to your cat's collar is a good way of keeping the fleas off it.Pennyroyal has an interesting minty flavour.
